question: I like the services that I received here
If I had other options, I would still elect to receive services from this agency
I would recommend this agency to a friend or family member
The location of the treatment facilities was convenient for me
Staff were available and willing to see me as often as I felt was necessary
Staff returned my phone calls within 24 hours
Services were available at times that accommodated my schedule
I was able to get all of the services I needed throughout treatment
I was able to see a psychiatrist when I wanted to
Staff here believe I can grow, change, and recover
I felt comfortable asking questions about my treatment and medications
I felt free to complain
I was given information about my rights regarding treatment
Staff encouraged me to take responsibility for how I live my life
Staff informed me of possible side effects associated with beginning and completing treatment
Staff respected my wishes about who was and who was not to be given information regarding my treatment
I, not staff, decided my treatment goals and treatment plan
Staff were sensitive to my cultural background
Staff helped me obtain the information I needed to take charge of managing my illness
Staff treated me with dignity
In a time of crisis my case manager or counselor was available and easy to contact
Staff treated members of the LGBTIQ community with dignity and respect
I can now deal more effectively with my daily problems
I am better able to control my life
I am better able to deal with crisis in my life
I get along better with my family now
I am doing better in school and or work
My housing situation has improved
I can now do things that are meaningful to me
My addiction, trauma, or mental health symptoms are no longer bothering me
I am better able to take care of my needs
I am better able to handle when things go wrong now
I am better able to do the things I want to do after treatment at this agency
I am better able to get and keep a job after treatment at this agency
I received information on addiction recovery at this agency
I was offered treatment and resources regarding my issues of trauma or abuse
I felt safe talking with staff about my experiences with trauma or abuse
I am happy with the friendships that I have
I have people with whom I can do enjoyable things
I feel I belong in my community
In a crisis, I have the support that I need from family and friends
I am functioning now better in social situations than before treatment
